org.daisy.dotify.api.formatter

Interface FormatterCore

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ContentCollection, TableOfContents, VolumeContentBuilder

    public interface FormatterCore
    Provides core formatter tasks.

      • newLine

        void newLine()
        Explicitly break the current line, even if the line has space left for more characters. The current block remains open.
        Throws:
